noPermission: It seems you don't have permission to do that
channelNotAdded: Please add the channel using /add before setting a language
logChannelAdded: {{{channel}}} has been defined as log channel, use /disablelogs to remove it
resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings?
listAdded: The word {{word}} was added to the {{list}}
listRemoved: The word {{word}} was removed from the {{list}}
listContains: Error, the word {{word}} is already in the {{list}}
listDoesntContains: Error, the word {{word}} is not in the {{list}}
listEmptyWord: You cannot insert empty words to the {{list}}
listWordLength: The word must be at least 3 characters and at most 32 characters
configConfirm:
**Careful**, anyone who have the link can configure the bot!
Make sure that you are in a private channel and don't give the link to untrusted people!
Press confirm to continue.
configLink:
Here is your config link, do not publicly give this link!
The link can be used for 15 minutes.
Only the latest generated link is valable.
{{{link}}}
error: An unknown error happened, if the error persists, you can join the support Discord.

help.name: Here is a list of all commands:

fields.name: **analyze** [text]
fields.value: - Analyze your message and give you a score

fields.name: **admin**
fields.value:
- Show admin commands
**Note :** Require 'manage server' permission

admin.name: Here is a list of admin commands:

fields.name: **config**
fields.value: Configure the bot trough a web interface

fields.name: **log**
fields.value: Define the channel of the command as the log channel

fields.name: **lang** [language]
fields.value: Change the global language of the bot (Use ISO 631-1, example: fr, es ,en)

fields.name: **add**
fields.value: Add a channel to be scanned and monitored by Observation

fields.name: **remove**
fields.value: Remove a channel from the eyes of Observation

fields.name: **channellang**
fields.value: Set the default lang for a specific channel (Use ISO 631-1, example: fr, es ,en) (Default: auto)

fields.name: **reset**
fields.value:
Delete ALL bot data from the server 
**Warning:** This command also deletes all users data!

fields.name: **whitelist / blacklist** [edit / list] [add / remove] [a word]
fields.value: Show the list or add or remove from a list.

warn.flagged: Your message have been flagged for:
